data.title: 15 Best SockShare Alternatives That Work in 2020
data.meta_description: Are you a former SockShare fan hunting the net for a similar site after the closure of the video streaming site? Here are the top SockShare alternatives to try.
data.text:
SockShare.net is among the sites that provide the latest and the best content.

But the SockShare movies are currently inaccessible. However, you can always move on to the best SockShare alternatives in 2024.

Sites like SockShare are popular for providing free content to viewers. SockShare, in particular, is more of an advanced search engine that helps you find third-party sites.

But the reason behind its popularity is also the reason why it’s under the radar. For this reason, currently, the site is currently closed.

15 Sockshare Alternatives in 2024 [Free Movie Sites]

Check out the list of the best SockShare alternative sites that you can use to gain free access to the latest and the best content!

1. Bmovies

If you’re missing the Sockshare free movies and are looking for similar sites, Bmovies is an excellent alternative for you.

Every content lover feels like a kid in a candy store on this video streaming platform. It has a huge library of movies and TV shows, and it’s not limited to just English content.

It’s easy to navigate the library on this site and watch the content you have been looking for online. Its search bar and categories make the job of searching for movies quite easy.

The only problem is that the site features an annoying number of popup ads. But look past those to enjoy good content.

https://bmovies.co/movies/

2. Flixtor

Looking for a platform with a wide range of movies, from classics to the latest releases? Flixtor is the perfect choice.

It’s an open-source platform with its own media player, offering a vast library of movies to keep you entertained all day. You won’t miss SockShare with this extensive collection.

You can easily browse through the site to find exactly what you want. The only downside is occasional popup ads, and non-members can’t watch movies in 1080p resolution—but membership is free, so there’s no need to worry!

https://flixtor.stream/

3. YifyTV

YifyTV is the ideal SockShare alternative that provides high-quality video content. Considered a reliable platform by most web content consumers, this site offers a wide collection of the best Torrent links.

High-quality content in different categories – You can binge-watch them all day long!

Navigating through the site is completely hassle-free, as the movies are arranged by name, genre, and year. You can also create your own “watch later” list here.

All the information about the movies is updated on the database frequently. The only catch is that you’ll need to get a free membership first.

http://yifytv.stream/

4. GoStream

The next site we recommend as a SockShare alternative is GoStream, a platform that brings you a collection of the most popular Hollywood movies, from old classics to the latest hits.

The site boasts of getting one of the highest numbers of visitors who come for Chinese, Japanese, and Indian films.

What’s more, the library of films is constantly expanding, and you will get the biggest hits in recent times on this site. It’s not just movies, though.

You will be able to find television shows, series, and more. You’ll find ads, popups, and redirects, but they are fewer in number than other sites.

https://gostream.site/

5. iSubsMovies

Next on our list of the best SockShare alternatives is iSubsMovies, a platform that brings movie buffs a huge collection of the best movies.

One of the best things about this platform is that it caters to film lovers from all over the world by offering subtitles in Spanish, Portuguese, German, Chinese, etc.

Since 2013, this site has built a massive collection. Like many other sites of this kind, it has faced copyright issues several times, but it has always bounced back.

The ads might interrupt you, but with newer movies and shows in high quality getting added regularly, you’ll learn to ignore them soon.

https://isubsmovies.com/

6. ZMovies

If you need a platform that is perfectly organized and does not need you to waste time in browning, ZMovies is the destination for you.

All the movies on the platform are organized to make the navigation process super-easy for you. It also has a number of filters that you can use for searching.

The site has a generous collection of movies of all genres from Hollywood, as well as independent movies.

Similar to Sockshare, the site contains links to third-party sites, as the site itself doesn’t host anything. It’s an easy process, though. You’ll need to create an account on the site to get started.

https://zmovies.cc/

7. Vumoo

Another streaming website that can be considered one of the best SockShare alternatives, Vumoo, is heaven for video content lovers.

It is a no-frills platform without too many flashy features. It is simple and direct, the perfect website that you can rely on for a wide collection.

The navigation process is quite straightforward, and with a simplistic design, you will have no trouble finding the content you are interested in.

Its search engine allows you to find a host of movies and television shows. With links to the best films and shows, you’ll binge-watch for hours on end.

https://vumoo.life/

8. MoviesPrimePro

Are you a fan of Indian movies and shows? Then MoviesPrimePro is definitely one of the best platforms you will find.

Indian movies are way beyond song-and-dance sequences, and if you’re looking to explore that world, MoviesPrimePro will give you access to free movies in HD quality.

Apart from Indian movies in different languages of the country, available with subtitles, you will also find movies and shows from other countries, not only from the Indian subcontinent but also from other parts of the world. The process of navigation is easy. Everything will be right in front of you.

https://www.moviesprimepro.com/

9. Tubitv

Among the websites that patrons of movies and shows usually visit, Tubitv is a rather underrated one. It is considered a premium site with an incredible collection that is easy to browse.

You will be able to find classics, new hits, latest shows, and much more, here. Its library will leave you awestruck.

Content consumers go so far as to claim that this website is like a free version of Netflix – with a bigger collection than the world’s most popular OTT platform.

The website’s collection includes Hollywood films, but that’s not all. If you’re always looking for unique films, this website is the place.

https://tubitv.com/

10. IOmovies

For those who are constantly struggling for a shared Netflix or Amazon account with their friends, IOmovies is like a blessing.

It is an OTT platform – only free. It is an ad-supported video streaming platform that offers links to movies. The collection is huge, even if you can’t find original movies.

The platform has an easy and user-friendly interface, and you will be able to find all desired content easily for an amazing video streaming experience.

Besides all popular Hollywood films, you will also find independent movies on this platform. You’ll also find TV shows, from sitcoms to reality shows.

https://iomovies.me/

11. Popcornflix

If you find on-demand video streaming platforms a little too expensive, here’s a platform that comes for free!

From its very name, you can understand that Popcornflix is dedicated to delivering enough movies to get you set in front of the screen with a bowl full of popcorn and a list full of films.

Besides popular movies of different genres, you will find documentaries on this platform. You can also catch up on the best television shows.

It also gives you access to viral videos. This gives Popcornflix a social-media-like feel. The site gets updated almost daily, to give you all the new things.

https://www.popcornflix.com/

12. Movie4K

A site that offers a plethora of links to movies and shows hosted by third-party sites, Movie4k Is one of the SockShare alternatives.

It is trusted by those who regularly watch online videos for free. Its main point of attraction is its content library, which is huge and keeps expanding on a regular basis.

While the site has run into trouble before for providing free content, it has always managed to bounce back to serve you again.

It is undoubtedly one of the oldest in the business. It has an attractive user interface and a user-friendly search engine that makes the site easily navigable.

https://www.movie4k.dev/

13. CMovies

One of the biggest platforms for movies, TV shows, and more, CMovies is a platform for all kinds of consumers with something amazing to cater to them.

From Hollywood’s biggest hits to the most beloved television series, it’s all here. This platform also has independent movies and local films.

Accessing the database of content on this website is really easy to use. It has a simple interface that allows this.

The only issue, like on most of the sites like SockShare, is that there are lots of ads and that you have to have a subscription on the website (for free) first. But there’s no other downside.

https://cmovies.fm/

14. SolarMovie

A site designed to cater to the cinephiles hunting the internet for some good movies, SolarMovie is one of the best SockShare alternatives that functions as a video distribution platform. With a premium experience of streaming videos, the site has a huge follower base looking for good films.

With an easy site and all information arranged carefully, this platform is a joy to use. It has a rich collection of the latest and greatest hits of Hollywood.

At the same time, it also gives you access to a host of world movies and independent movies. What about TV shows, you ask? They’re there, too!

https://wwv.solarmovie.one/

15. GOMovies

The final name on our list of the best SockShare alternatives is GOMovies. It is a hugely popular website for enjoying a fabulous range of movies and series.

All the movies and shows that you have been putting on your bucket list for a while now are there on this website, waiting for you.

Browsing the site is extremely easy since everything is categorized alphabetically on the site. You will find what you’re looking for in no time – in HD quality!

Yes, you will have to deal with a large number of ads, but that’s how the website keeps running to cater to entertainment lovers like you.

https://gomovies-online.vip/

FAQs

What Is SockShare?

SockShare is a popular online platform for streaming movies. Founded in the year 2012, it has been frequented by a huge number of movie buffs around the world. It’s a legal site as it doesn’t store content on its server. It offers links to third-party websites. It’s currently closed down.

Is SockShare Safe To Use?

On Sockshare, you won’t find movies on the server, which maintains its legal status. Instead, it provides links to third-party websites. However, there are pop-up ads, and you won’t get information on whether your computer is getting infected, though there is a little chance that the browser has some abnormality.

Has SockShare Been Shut Down?

SockShare was a well-liked movie streaming site among fans, but like others, it closed due to sharing content for free, avoiding permanent shutdown and legal issues.

Why Is SockShare Not Working?

SockShare is a popular video streaming website that provides movies and shows to consumers around the world. However, it hasn’t been accessible for a while now. That’s because it has been closed down now due to the nature of the site, i.e., it offers free content to viewers.

What Are The Best SockShare Alternatives?
